rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究凸显儿童对医学术语的误解明尼苏达大学医学院的一项新研究发表在儿科杂志上，强调了儿童如何解释常见的医学短语，揭示了令人惊讶的——；有时令人震惊-；误解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Study-highlights-childrens-misunderstands-of-medical-terminology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Study-highlights-childrens-misunderstands-of-medical-terminology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea4dfd16-35e9-4677-a1e6-787cb53ffee1 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 01:26:23 -0500 Study highlights children's misunderstandings of medical terminology
研究显示聊天机器人使用痴呆症筛查的认知局限性《英国医学杂志》圣诞期的一项研究发现，在广泛用于发现痴呆症早期迹象的测试中，几乎所有领先的大型语言模型或“聊天机器人”都显示出轻度认知障碍的迹象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Study-shows-chatbotse28099-cognitive-limitations-using-dementia-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Study-shows-chatbotse28099-cognitive-limitations-using-dementia-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13061478-095a-48e4-a955-9ef347115dd7 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 01:05:13 -0500 Study shows chatbots’ cognitive limitations using dementia screening
基于精益方法的方法减少了外科住院医生不必要的工作时间加州大学圣地亚哥分校医学院的研究人员表明，采用系统方法消除外科住院医师计划中的低效率问题可以减少加州大学圣地亚哥分校普通住院医师计划中不必要的工作时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Lean-methodology-based-approach-reduces-unnecessary-work-hours-for-surgical-residents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Lean-methodology-based-approach-reduces-unnecessary-work-hours-for-surgical-residents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dec6e713-e870-485c-9017-295caa356b55 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 01:01:41 -0500 Lean methodology-based approach reduces unnecessary work hours for surgical residents
对抗前列腺癌的新方法印第安纳大学医学院科学家及其合作者团队的新研究发现，前列腺癌动物模型存在一种新的脆弱性，这种脆弱性会使前列腺肿瘤缺乏关键营养物质并阻碍其生长，这可能会导致针对这种致命疾病的新疗法的开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/A-novel-approach-to-combatting-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/A-novel-approach-to-combatting-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8cd9c4aa-a794-4c94-804c-b9123febc719 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 00:58:05 -0500 A novel approach to combatting prostate cancer
多种慢性病与老年人肾功能下降有关根据《美国老年医学会杂志》发表的新研究，患有多种慢性病的老年人可能面临肾功能下降的高风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Multiple-chronic-conditions-linked-to-kidney-function-decline-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Multiple-chronic-conditions-linked-to-kidney-function-decline-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c2d49e3-47ab-4c8f-9f70-6000cbef7769 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 00:43:52 -0500 Multiple chronic conditions linked to kidney function decline in older adults
少量和适量饮酒可降低心血管并发症的风险巴塞罗那大学、医院诊所和 August Pi i Sunyer 生物医学研究所 (IDIBAPS)、肥胖生理病理学中心的研究人员领导的一项多中心研究表明，少量和适量饮酒与心血管并发症的风险较低有关和营养网络生物医学研究中心 (CIBEROBN) 和纳瓦拉大学 (UNAV)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Light-and-moderate-wine-conspiration-linked-to-lower-risk-of-cardioangio-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Light-and-moderate-wine-conspiration-linked-to-lower-risk-of-cardioangio-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76613733-c257-49fc-9aef-83829a0f6d64 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 00:39:44 -0500 Light and moderate wine consumption linked to lower risk of cardiovascular complications
研究表明天然肽如何对抗黑色素瘤耐药性来自螃蟹和蜘蛛的抗菌肽可能提供克服晚期黑色素瘤耐药性的途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Study-shows-how-peptides-from-nature-could-combat-melanoma-drug-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Study-shows-how-peptides-from-nature-could-combat-melanoma-drug-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26132e25-2fb0-4740-9158-d02442518c69 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 00:19:00 -0500 Study shows how peptides from nature could combat melanoma drug resistance
智能手表带可能会让用户接触到永久有害的化学物质智能手表和健身追踪器已成为无处不在的可穿戴技术，陪伴许多人度过白天（和夜晚）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Smartwatch-bands-may-expose-users-to-harmful-forever-chemicals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Smartwatch-bands-may-expose-users-to-harmful-forever-chemicals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cc814a6-658f-48c4-8e71-1d06fee40637 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 00:18:04 -0500 Smartwatch bands may expose users to harmful forever chemicals
研究确定了影响助产士健康的关键压力源对助产士压力的研究发现，助产士个人和医疗保健信托基金可以采取最有效的行动来增强福祉并减少负面结果，包括员工离开该行业。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Research-identizes-key-stressors-impacting-midwives-wellbeing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Research-identizes-key-stressors-impacting-midwives-wellbeing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ecf9404-57ef-4ca0-b87e-14d20f0486ef Thu, 19 Dec 2024 00:17:00 -0500 Research identifies key stressors impacting midwives' wellbeing
外科医生在采用新生物材料治疗骨缺损方面进展缓慢全世界每年进行 200 万例骨移植，其中仅在美国就进行了 50 万例。然而，昆士兰科技大学主导的一项研究发现，外科医生在采用新开发的生物材料或组织工程解决方案方面进展缓慢。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Surgeons-slow-to-adopt-new-biomaterials-for-bone-defects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Surgeons-slow-to-adopt-new-biomaterials-for-bone-defects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90c88685-6033-4400-a456-b0377ef855bd Thu, 19 Dec 2024 00:14:00 -0500 Surgeons slow to adopt new biomaterials for bone defects
